Sean_Hogan:
{{short description|Canadian country music singer-songwriter}} {{about|the Canadian singer-songwriter|the American businessman|Shawn Hogan|the Irish republican|Seán Hogan}} {{Use mdy dates|date=October 2020}} {{Infobox musical artist | | image = Sean_Hogan.jpg | name = Sean Hogan | | caption = Sean Hogan, November 2005 | background = solo_singer | | origin = [[Sarnia]], Ontario, Canada | | instrument = Guitar | | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | | occupation = singer-songwriter | | years_active = 1996–present | | label = Barnstorm
Raving Rooster | | associated_acts = | | website = [http://www.seanhogan.net/ www.seanhogan.net] | }} '''Sean Hogan''' is a Canadian [[country music]] singer-songwriter. ==Biography== Born in [[Sarnia]], Ontario, Hogan attended [[Fanshawe College]] in [[London, Ontario]], studying music.{{cite news|author = The Observer|title = Sean Hogan to play the Imperial Centre|publisher = Sarnia Observer |date = June 1, 2002}}{{cite news|author = The Observer|title = Sean Hogan offers his take on Junos|publisher = Sarnia Observer|date = March 11, 2000}} In 2003 he won the Roots Artist of the Year at the Canadian Country Music Awards and he has also won the Independent Male Artist of the Year award in 1997.{{cite news|author = Mike Bell|title = SUN RISES ON SEAN HOGAN|publisher = Calgary Sun|date = May 26, 2004}} Hogan engages in charity work and in 2005 the Saskatchewan Country Music Association named him Humanitarian of the Year.{{cite news|author = John P. McLaughlin|title = 'Help out and give back': Sean Hogan brings cavalcade of Canadian talent to town|publisher = The Vancouver Province|date = December 19, 2005}} ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" ! style="width:14em;"| Title ! style="width:18em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| ''Sean Hogan'' | * Release date: April 1996 * Label: Barnstorm |- ! scope="row"| ''Hijacked'' | * Release date: June 1999 * Label: Barnstorm |- ! scope="row"| ''Late Last Night'' | * Release date: November 20, 2001 * Label: Barnstorm |- ! scope="row"| ''Ruled by Mercury''
